titleStmt.title: The watchmans watchword. A sermon preached at White-Hall upon the 30 of March last, being the fifth Wednesday in Lent, and the day of the monethly fast: by Richard Love D.D. Master of Corpus Christi Colledge in Cambridge, and chaplain in ordinary to his Majestie. Published by command.
titleStmt.author: Love, Richard, 1596-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Roger Daniel printer to the Universitie of Cambridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
